name: what-do-i-do
description: Uma lista de tarefas simples utilizando Node, React e Typescript.

scripts.dev-install: npx concurrently "cd server/ && npm install --silent" "cd client/ && npm install --silent"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd server/ && npm run dev" "cd client/ && npm run dev"
scripts.server-test: cd server/ && npm run test && cd ..
